scene.name: outside-church
scene.line: A singing chorus echoes from within the church. The building is one story tall with a pitched roof, and a three-story spire rising from the front. The top section of the spire is made of stained glass. An interior light illuminates the pines in red, green and blue.
A large LED display glows in the parking lot:
"LIGHT OF THE LAST GREAT AWAKENING BAPTIST CHURCH"

scene.name: outside-church-options

option.insertedText: Conway walks to the rear of the building.

scene.option: Walk around to the rear of the building.

option.insertedText: Conway stands and listen to the chorus.

scene.name: enter-church
scene.line: The front doors of the church are modest and worn. They are locked.

scene.name: outside-listen
scene.line: The muffled chorus drones at a steady volume, repeating the same two verses without rest.

scene.name: building-rear
scene.line: A ramp leads up from a few dusty metal trash cans to the church's back door.

scene.name: building-rear-options

option.insertedText: Conway opens a few of the trash cans and looks in.
Conway pushes open the back door.
Conway returns to the front of the building.

scene.option: Go back to the front of the building.

scene.name: trash
scene.line: One has a bit of something leafy and rotten stuck to the bottom of it. Another is full of unlabeled videotapes.

scene.name: inside-kitchen
scene.line: He finds himself in a kitchen lit by a buzzing fluorescent ceiling fixture. On the counter are a plate of moldy bread and an empty dixie cup flecked red around its waxy rim. A set of swinging plastic doors on the far wall lead out of the kitchen.

option.insertedText: Conway pushes open the plastic doors and walks through.
Conway walks out the back door.

scene.name: nave
scene.line: Vacant pews sprawl unevenly into the church. A small raised stage lies to Conway's right, bare except for a tape recorder.
The tape recorder's power cord runs to an outlet near Conway's feet.

option.insertedText: Conway walks back into the kitchen.

scene.name: unplug-tape-recorder
scene.line: The singing stops. The lights fail.
